channel.title: Pickup command help ...(it does work... but not what i want)

item.title: Pickup command help ...(it does work... but not what i want)
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

In my pickup command when spawning an item above 10000 do not put an amount next to it or it could cause it to return an invalid item ID instead try typing ::pickup 11177. my pickup command works in this way, any item below 10000 and you can include an amount.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command help ...(it does work... but not what i want)
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

Well… im using the new salib client…

But when i try to pickup an object… like 11177…

I dont get it and it says i need to typ it right?

How do i make it so i do get the item??

			if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
					if (newItemID <= 11998 && newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0800 100");
				}
			}

Anything wrong??

Read full topic
